channel.title: Hi I'm Scott Watermasysk from KickoffLabs
channel.description:
Hi Everyone,
I am Scott Watermasysk, the smarter, better looking, and more humble co-founder of [KickoffLabs][1].
KickoffLabs provides an easy to use platform for email marketing, lead generation, and landing page management all backed by exceptional support (seriously, we love support!).
We are profitable 100% bootstrapped company and have been in business for about 2.5 years.
One of the reasons we originally build KickoffLabs was to help other would-be entrepreneurs realize their own dreams of starting a business and building something they could love, so if there is anything I can do to help you be successful in your own business, please do not hesitate to ask here or email me directly at scott@kickofflabs.com
[1]: http://www.kickofflabs.com

item.title: Hi I'm Scott Watermasysk from KickoffLabs

item.description:
Hi Scott,

Nice to see you here, haven’t talked to you in a long time. This is Salman from csharpfriends

Read full topic

Welcome Scott.

Just an FYI, for others on this forum. If you’d like to hear more about Scott and his company, he was our special guest on episode 14 of Bootstrapped.fm
